dataset.query: select * from dsinfo where dsid like '%' and archivestat not like 'SUPERSEDED' order by dsid

column.name: target_type
column.value: select distinct ti.targtype from targetinfo ti, dstarg dt where ti.targname = dt.targname and dt.dsid like '#' order by ti.targtype

column.name: instrument_type
column.value: select distinct ii.insttype from dshost dh, instinfo ii where dh.insthostid = ii.insthostid and dh.instid = ii.instid and dh.dsid like '#' order by ii.insttype

column.name: instrument_host_id
column.value: select distinct insthostid from dshost where dsid like '#' order by insthostid

column.name: mission_name
column.value: select distinct msnname from dsmsn where dsid like '#' order by msnname

column.name: mission_start_date
column.value: select distinct mi.msnstrtdate from msninfo mi, dsmsn dm where mi.msnname = dm.msnname and dm.dsid like '#'

column.name: mission_stop_date
column.value: select distinct mi.msnstopdate from msninfo mi, dsmsn dm where mi.msnname = dm.msnname and dm.dsid like '#'

column.name: target_name
column.value: select distinct targname from dstarg where dsid like '#' order by targname

column.name: instrument_id
column.value: select distinct instid from dshost where dsid like '#' order by instid

column.name: instrument_name
column.value: select distinct ii.instname from dshost dh, instinfo ii where dh.insthostid = ii.insthostid and dh.instid = ii.instid and dh.dsid like '#' order by ii.instname

column.name: resource_id
column.value: select distinct rd.resourceid from resds rd where rd.dsid like '#' order by rd.resourceid

column.name: data_set_desc
column.value: select distinct dsd.dsd from dsd where dsd.dsid like '#' order by dsd.tupseqnum

column.name: confidence_level_note
column.value: select distinct dsconf.conflvlnote from dsconf where dsconf.dsid like '#' order by dsconf.tupseqnum
